Class Try.Failure<T>

java.lang.Object
com.dudko.tools.safejavastreams.core.Try<T>
com.dudko.tools.safejavastreams.core.Try.Failure<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the value
Enclosing class:
Try<T>
public static final class Try.Failure<T> extends Try<T>
Represents a failed computation.
